news.title: Inflation rate eases to 2.4% in March, lower than expected; core at 4-year low
news.summary: Consumer price index fell a seasonally adjusted 0.1% in March. 12-month inflation rate at 2.4%, down from 2.8% in February.

news.title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says he believes sellers will pass increased tariff costs on to consumers
news.summary: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy said he thinks third-party sellers "will pass costs on" to consumers as a result of President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs.

news.title: Tesla launches in Saudi Arabia amid Chinese competition and tumbling sales
news.summary: Electric vehicles accounted for just 1% of all car sales in the kingdom in 2024, according to PwC. Electric vehicles are expected to account for just one per cent of car sales by 2024.

news.title: Roller coaster week for global bonds continues as 'Trump put' sparks reversals
news.summary: "There's a sense of relief that trade deals with the U.S. are firmly on the table," economists say. "There's been a lot of talk about the possibility of a trade war with the United States," they say.

news.title: MLB weighs a salary cap as potential lockout looms in 2026
news.summary: MLB executives at both the league and team level have discussed what a new league economic structure could look like as the CBA expires 2026.
